channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned car, 13th November
item.description:
This car car hasn't moved from this spot for several weeks now

item.title: Roots damaging everything around the tree as they are exposed and above ground, 13th November
item.description:
Roots damaging pavement, damaging nearby driveway and already apear on top of street too. Tgis tree shakes very badly during strong winds and every time when there is strong winds we fear for vehicles parked on driveway and for structures around the tree. This tree is DANGEROUS and his roots are damaging pavement ( was repaired 2-3 years ago and is already damaged again and its again accident waiting to happen)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Sydney Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
